name: ISO/IEC 14496-2:2004. Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects -- Part 2: Visual (formal name). MPEG-4, Visual Coding (common name)

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

description: Compression encoding for video identical to ITU-T (International Telecommunications Union-Telecommunication Standardization Sector) recommendation H.263.  Links to brief descriptions of profiles intended for different video applications.  Quality and resolution depend on the individual profile used.
